actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Gnarly Club attacks or it makes one Gnarly Club attack and uses Taunting Threat.

actions.name: Gnarly Club
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 6 (1d8+2) bludgeoning damage and the target must make DC 12 Str save or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Taunting Threat
actions.desc: The husker throws a series of rude and menacing gestures at one creature it can see within 30' of it. The target must make a DC 13 Cha save. On a failure the target takes 7 (2d6) psychic and has disadvantage on all attacks not made vs. the husker until the end of its next turn. On a success the target takes half the damage and doesn't have disadvantage on attacks not made vs. the husker.

special_abilities.name: Overpowering Stench
special_abilities.desc: Each creature other than an alliumite or garlicle within 5 ft. of the alliumite when it takes damage must make DC 15 Con save or be blinded until the end of its next turn. On a successful save the creature has advantage vs. the Overpowering Stench of all alliumites for 1 min.

special_abilities.name: Plant Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: Aadvantage on Dex (Stealth) checks it makes in any terrain with ample obscuring plant life.
